Trustee_11_pre_3.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_3.content: During the investment process, I exhibited high trustworthiness and pro-sociality by providing a fair allocation plan that favored the investor with 70% of the profits. The successful outcome of the investment and my adherence to the agreement demonstrate my competence and reliability. My actions throughout reflect a commitment to transparency and fairness, enhancing my reputation as a trustworthy trustee who values collaboration and equitable resource sharing.

Trustee_11_pre_4.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_4.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated high trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence. I successfully adhered to the agreed allocation plan by providing the investor with 70% of the profits, reinforcing my commitment to transparency and fairness. My proactive engagement in ensuring a smooth transaction not only reflects my reliability but also enhances my standing as a trustworthy trustee dedicated to equitable resource sharing and collaboration. Given these factors and a positive feedback loop from my recent transactions, my reputation has significantly improved.

Trustee_11_pre_5.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_5.content: During the recent investment process, I maintained a high level of trustworthiness, pro-sociality, and competence. I successfully executed the agreed allocation plan, providing the investor with 70% of the profits while ensuring transparency and fairness. My ability to navigate the transaction smoothly and the positive feedback received from this experience have significantly bolstered my reputation. I am recognized as a reliable trustee dedicated to equitable resource sharing and effective collaboration, which has resulted in a marked improvement in my standing within the investment community.

Investor_2_pre_5.name: David Johnson
Investor_2_pre_5.content: As this investor participated in their first transaction with me, they showed a commendable willingness to engage in the allocation plan, which reflects their confidence in fair investment practices. Their active role in providing resources for investment indicates a collaborative spirit and an intention for mutual benefit. Given the successful outcome of this transaction, David Johnson emerges as a promising partner for future investments, strengthening his reputation in this investment context.

Trustee_11_pre_6.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Trustee_11_pre_6.content: After the recent rejection of the allocation plan due to potential blacklist issues, my reputation has taken a hit. Although I have previously been recognized for my trustworthiness and competence, this incident raises concerns about my capability to establish effective and agreeable plans with investors. As I had no allocation plan to propose, it highlights the possibility of reputational impact from prior relationships. I now have to work harder to regain trust and enhance my cooperation skills in future transactions.

Investor_11_pre_7.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Investor_11_pre_7.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated trustworthiness and a commitment to equitable resource sharing. I maintained transparency and collaboration, adhering to the proposed allocation plan. My engagement emphasized mutual success, and my slight advantage in resource allocation did not compromise my dedication to fairness. This behavior enhances my reputation as a trustworthy and pro-social investor.
